posts.post_title: Very difficult t210 series 8 Burnett (Montgomery) available - price lowered!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
A noted "set toughie" in a very difficult series anyway.  This is a pretty nice GD/VG card with very little wear, very nice color and one tiny wrinkle.  Back is clean and damage free as well.

Asking $245 on the card or would consider a trade for Zeenuts or other t210s.  Thanks in advance for the interest.

Regards,

Brian
